name: Instructor Usage
description: The Instructor Usage data set returns information about how instructors are using Brightspace functionality within their courses. Required Permission Advanced Data Sets > Can execute Instructor Usage (Organization level) Available Filters Returned Fields

columns.name: Username
columns.description: Instructor's username.

columns.name: First Name
columns.description: Instructor's first name.

columns.name: Last Name
columns.description: Instructor's last name.

columns.name: Org Defined Id
columns.description: Instructor's Org Defined Id (often the learner identifier from an SIS system).

columns.name: User Id
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the instructor.

columns.name: Role Name
columns.description: Instructor's role at the specific course offering.

columns.name: Role Id
columns.description: Instructor's role Id at the specific course offering.

columns.name: Is Active
columns.description: Instructor's status.

columns.name: Course Offering Name
columns.description: Name of the course offering.

columns.name: Course Offering Code
columns.description: Often the course identifier from an SIS system.

columns.name: Course Offering Id
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the course offering.

columns.name: Number of Content Topics Visited
columns.description: Number of content topics the instructor visited in the course offering.

columns.name: Last Access to Course Offering Content
columns.description: Last date/time the instructor accessed content within the course offering.

columns.name: Number of Assignments
columns.description: Number of assignments in the course offering.

columns.name: Number of Assignment Submissions Commented on
columns.description: Number of assignment submissions the instructor commented on in the course offering.

columns.name: Number of Grade Items
columns.description: Number of grade items in the course offering.

columns.name: Number of Graded Grade Items
columns.description: Number of grade items the instructor graded in the course offering.

columns.name: Last Modification of a Grade Item
columns.description: Last date/time a grade item in the course was modified by the instructor.

columns.name: Number of Discussion Posts
columns.description: Number of discussion posts in the course offering.

columns.name: Number of Discussion Posts Authored
columns.description: Number of discussion posts the instructor authored in the course offering.

columns.name: Last Discussion Post Date
columns.description: Date/time the instructor last posted a discussion in the course.

columns.name: Last Access to Course Offering
columns.description: Last date/time (UTC format) the instructor accessed the course offering.

columns.name: Number of Logins to the System
columns.description: Number of times the instructor accessed Brightspace.

columns.name: Last Sent Mail Date
columns.description: Last date/time the instructor sent an email from within the course offering.
